actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to reduce the percentage rates of employee deductions, agency contributions, and deposits for civil service retirement purposes.

summary.text: Reduces by 1/2 percent the percentage rates of employee deductions, agency contributions, and deposits for civil service retirement purposes.

titles.title: A bill to reduce the percentage rates of employee deductions, agency contributions, and deposits for civil service retirement purposes.
